titles.title: Rejoice In The Lord, Lift Up Your Heart And Sing

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Rejoice in the Lord, lift up your heart and sing.
Rejoice in the Lord, always.
Happy is the man who makes the Lord his choice.
Rejoice in the Lord and again I say rejoice.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:

Alegre es el hombre
cuyo Dios es Jehov치

otra vez regocijaos.
